item.title: UIButton, display a button (Swift5.0)
item.description: This is a sample code to display a button using UIButton. I use the rounded corner buttons a lot.

item.title: Using UISlider to retrieve a value at regular intervals (Swift5.0)
item.description: 0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5 ….. The following is a sample code to get the value at regular intervals of 0, 0, 5, 1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1, 1, 5, and so on with UISlider.

item.title: Getting a value with UISlider (Swift5.0)
item.description: This is the sample code to get the value with UISlider. You can take any value in between by setting a minimum and maximum value.
